title: Stucking
body: After I finished my game, the screen was showing up with statistics just closed itself. But, I have tried to log on and off several times for new game, it was still stuck on that I am still in last game. How can I fix this?

replies.body: Same thing is happeneing to me man my game is sitting on reconect even after we won
yup! same exact thing is happening to me now, can't reconnect
